pull.title: Changed "Send" button default status from true to false
pull.body:
Changed the "Send" button's default status from true to false to prevent
quirky Windows autofocus behavior.

events.message:
Changed "Send" button default status from true to false

Changed the "Send" button's default status from true to false to prevent
quirky Windows autofocus behavior.

events.body:
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10177/commits/8c3e6c6987f3f1d123201d401ace2de9970aa29d

Would be useful to reference that this fixes #10174.
This change prevents the cursor from being repositioned in undesired places as mentioned in #10174.
@KibbledJiveElkZoo "massive" (not really). Your change will be included and credited in Bitcoin Core 0.15.0. It is not a big enough bug fix to be included in 0.14.2 which has been already released.

Everyone that contributes to a release warrants being included in the credits in the "contributed to this release directly" list, no exceptions.

But as @achow101 says this wasn't part of 0.14.2, so it won't be in those. Usually for the name we automatically use the name you used for the commit author, so "KibbledJiveElkZoo".

I guess we could consider this for 0.14.3. In any case it will be in 0.15.0 (as its in master).
I thank you both for the trouble of expending time babysitting my nearly equally massive vain insecurity.
